title: Revealed: Full final policy platform set to shape next Labour manifesto - LabourList
summary: This article outlines Labour's policy platform for the next general election, covering six key areas: a green and digital future, better jobs and work, safe and secure communities, public services, families, and Britain in the world. The document details numerous policy proposals spanning a wide range of issues, including environmental sustainability, economic development, social justice, and national security.
